Constructor Detail

ExtendedCommandAPDU

public ExtendedCommandAPDU(int size)
Constructs an empty ISO 7816-4 APDU command as a ExtendedCommandAPDU object. This APDU can be build after creation using setClassByte, setInstructionByte... This ExtendedCommandAPDU must then be validated using the flush() method.
Parameters:
size - Size of the buffer
